text:
Hi, don’t know if this would be right place but let’s try:

I’m building HubSpot App for internal use. I’ve created one on our developers account, and created auth link with redirection page. When I’m using this link, just after selecting account on which I would like to install app, I’m almost immediately redirected to page specified in link settings. I cannot authorise account to use application.

Have anyone faced such issue?

have you already installed the app before?

check your connected apps by going to - setting > integration > connected apps and see if your app is already listed there. if yes, then you need to disconnect it to test complete flow <@U06DJE6UGP2>
no, this is the first time I’m trying to install it
I’m seeing authorisation page for a moment, but almost immediately it is redirecting me to redirect page
that's not the expected flow, have you tried selecting any other account ?
and is this redirection coming with the `?code` parameter?
for other app it is not redirecting, so it is strictly something with sandbox
never encountered anything like this with sandboxes either, maybe you can try creating another sandbox and try with that.
Hey Everyone! i am looking for any tools that help identify all unused forms and workflows to keep our HubSpot clean. Any suggestions app wise?
Lot of HubSpot partners have processes for this type of thing. Portal audits is usually what this is called. <@UK7F2BSPJ> is definitely someone that could help you with this

Hey <@U06CWPL9GTD>!  For forms and workflows:

1 - For forms, you can look at last submission date being over X and it not being used in any "Places"
2 - For workflows, I look to see if it's on, and has had action in the last 180 days

These are some hard and fast rules to get you started
are there any automated tools that can group them all or is it just a quick manual deal

Greetings, everyone! I trust you're all doing well.
I have a question concerning the development and publication of a "Public App" in the marketplace. My aim is to craft a public app that seamlessly integrates with my HubSpot pages, serving purposes such as landing pages or template pages. This app should have the capability to manipulate and handle CMS data. Thus far, my exploration has revealed that Public App integrations are primarily geared towards CRM functionalities. Could anyone please provide guidance on whether there is a viable way to achieve this?
